science.mecanisme: Double réaction: Maillard (protéines+sucres 140-180°C) sur chair, caramélisation sucres (160°C+) sur peau laquée. Cuisson deux temps pour peau croustillante + chair rosée

associations.effet: Synergie umami multiplicatrice avec IMP canard

hero.description: Magret de canard entier laqué brillant, peau caramélisée brun-noir quadrillée, sur planche bois
hero.prompt: Professional food photography of glazed duck breast magret with shiny caramelized dark brown skin, diamond crosshatch pattern visible, placed on wooden board, glossy lacquer finish, natural lighting from side, 45-degree angle, shallow depth of field, appetizing presentation

process.description: Peau de magret quadrillée en croisillons profonds avant cuisson
process.prompt: Top-down close-up of raw duck breast with skin scored in deep crosshatch diamond pattern, knife visible, clean cutting board, natural daylight, precise knife work detail

process.description: Magret en cuisson côté peau, graisse fondant dans poêle
process.prompt: Side view of duck breast cooking skin-side down in pan, melted fat pooling, golden skin crisping, steam rising, professional cooking technique, natural kitchen lighting

process.description: Badigeonnage du magret avec laque miel-soja à la cuillère
process.prompt: Close-up of glazing duck breast with honey-soy lacquer using spoon, glossy sauce dripping, caramelized skin visible underneath, brush or spoon in action, dramatic lighting

final.description: Magret tranché en biais révélant chair rose, peau laquée brillante, disposé en éventail
final.prompt: Sliced duck breast magret fanned out on white plate, revealing perfectly pink interior, glossy caramelized skin, sauce drizzled, garnished with micro herbs, 45-degree angle, restaurant plating, natural lighting, appetizing colors
